segments.text: Can I get some medicine to help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For your high blood pressure , we have several choices of medications .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What types of drugs can I try ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hydrochlorothiazide is a diuretic that helps you with water retention .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about side effects from that medication ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most people have no side effects . You will have to make sure that you drink plenty of liquids with this medication .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I only need to take that one drug ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to add a second drug for now , Lisinopril , which is an ACE inhibitor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What can I expect when I take that medication ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will feel much better except for the fact that you might have a little cough .
segments.speaker: S2
